title: Intel expands the scope of vPro processors with the 12th-gen lineup
content:
Today, Intel is announcing the latest for vPro, its hardware-based security solution. Most of the 12th-gen lineup has already been revealed, but we’re getting all of the details today. There are now different vPro categories: Intel vPro Enterprise, Intel vPro Enterprise for Chrome, Intel vPro Essentials, and Intel vPro – An Intel Evo Design. Intel

The post Intel expands the scope of vPro processors with the 12th-gen lineup appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Intel is announcing its 12th-gen vPro lineup, and it's expanding the lineup into two categories, one for enterprises and one for SMBs.
